openGraph.title: coder
openGraph.description: Decode from various formats such as Base64, URL, etc. online, or conveniently use as many times as you want to encode.

desc.BASE64: Encode or decode data using Base64 representation.
desc.URI: Encode or decode a full URI string.
desc.URI_COMPONENT: Encode or decode a URI component.
desc.HEX: Convert text to or from hexadecimal.
desc.BINARY: Convert text to or from binary.
